00029 class biblio_list
00030 {
00031     /* Private properties */
00032     private $obj_db = false;
00033     private $resultset = false;
00034     private $num2show = 10;
00035     private $subquery = array();
00036     private $biblio_ids = array();
00037     private $emulate_short_word_search = false;
00038     private $queries_word_num_allowed = 20;
00039     private $query_error;
00040     /* Public properties */
00041     public $num_rows = 0;
00042     public $xml_detail = true;
00043     public $xml_result = true;
00044     public $only_promoted = false;
00045     public $show_labels = true;
00046     public $stop_words = array('a', 'an', 'of', 'the', 'to', 'so', 'as', 'be');
00047     public $query_time = 0;
00048     /* Protected properties */
00049     protected $criteria = array();
00050     protected $label_cache = array();
00051     protected $custom_fields = array();
00052     protected $enable_custom_frontpage = false;
00053     protected $orig_query;
00054     protected $searchable_fields = array('title', 'author', 'subject', 'isbn',
00055   'publisher', 'gmd', 'notes', 'colltype', 'publishyear',
00056   'location', 'itemcode', 'callnumber', 'itemcallnumber', 'notes');
00057     protected $field_join_type = array('title' => 'OR', 'author' => 'OR', 'subject' => 'OR');
00058     protected $current_page = 1;

00066     public function __construct($obj_db)

00078     public function setSQLcriteria($str_criteria)
00079     {
00080         if (!$str_criteria)
00081             return null;
00082         // defaults
00083         $_sql_criteria = '';
00084         $_searched_fields = array();
00085         $_title_buffer = '';
00086         $_previous_field = '';
00087         $_boolean = '';
00088         // parse query
00089         $this->orig_query = $str_criteria;
00090         $_queries = simbio_tokenizeCQL($str_criteria, $this->searchable_fields, $this->stop_words, $this->queries_word_num_allowed);
00091         // var_dump($_queries);
00092         if (count($_queries) < 1) {
00093             return null;
00094         }
00095         // loop each query
00096         foreach ($_queries as $_num => $_query) {
00097             // field
00098             $_field = $_query['f'];
00099             // for debugging purpose only
00100             // echo "<p>$_num. $_field -> $_boolean -> $_sql_criteria</p><p>&nbsp;</p>";
00101             // boolean
00102             if ($_title_buffer == '' && $_field != 'boolean') {
00103                 $_sql_criteria .= " $_boolean ";
00104             }
00105             // $_sql_criteria .= " $_boolean ";
00106             // flush title string concatenation
00107             if ($_field != 'title' && $_title_buffer != '') {
00108                 $_title_buffer = trim($_title_buffer);
00109                 $_sql_criteria .= " biblio.biblio_id IN(SELECT DISTINCT biblio_id FROM biblio WHERE MATCH (title, series_title) AGAINST ('$_title_buffer' IN BOOLEAN MODE)) ";
00110                 // reset title buffer
00111                 $_title_buffer = '';
00112             }
00113             //  break the loop if we meet `cql_end` field
00114             if ($_field == 'cql_end') { break; }
00115             // boolean mode
00116             $_b = isset($_query['b'])?$_query['b']:$_query;
00117             if ($_b == '*') {
00118                 $_boolean = 'OR';
00119             } else { $_boolean = 'AND'; }
00120             // search value
00121             $_q = @$this->obj_db->escape_string($_query['q']);
00122             // searched fields flag set
00123             $_searched_fields[$_field] = 1;
00124             $_previous_field = $_field;
00125             // check field
00126             if ($_field == 'title') {
00127                 if (strlen($_q) < 4) {
00128                     $_previous_field = 'title_short';
00129                     $_sql_criteria .= " biblio.title LIKE '%$_q%' ";
00130                     $_title_buffer = '';
00131                 } else {
00132                     if (isset($_query['is_phrase'])) {
00133                         $_title_buffer .= ' '.$_b.'"'.$_q.'"';
00134                     } else {
00135                         $_title_buffer .= ' '.$_b.$_q;
00136                     }
00137                 }
00138             } else if ($_field == 'author') {
00139                 if ($_b == '-') {
00140                     $_sql_criteria .= " biblio.biblio_id NOT IN(SELECT ba.biblio_id FROM biblio_author AS ba"
00141                         ." LEFT JOIN mst_author AS a ON ba.author_id=a.author_id"
00142                         ." WHERE author_name LIKE '%$_q%')";
00143                 } else {
00144                     $_sql_criteria .= " biblio.biblio_id IN(SELECT ba.biblio_id FROM biblio_author AS ba"
00145                         ." LEFT JOIN mst_author AS a ON ba.author_id=a.author_id"
00146                         ." WHERE author_name LIKE '%$_q%')";
00147                 }
00148             } else if ($_field == 'subject') {
00149                 if ($_b == '-') {
00150                     $_sql_criteria .= " biblio.biblio_id NOT IN(SELECT bt.biblio_id FROM biblio_topic AS bt"
00151                         ." LEFT JOIN mst_topic AS t ON bt.topic_id=t.topic_id"
00152                         ." WHERE topic LIKE '%$_q%')";
00153                 } else {
00154                     $_sql_criteria .= " biblio.biblio_id IN(SELECT bt.biblio_id FROM biblio_topic AS bt"
00155                         ." LEFT JOIN mst_topic AS t ON bt.topic_id=t.topic_id"
00156                         ." WHERE topic LIKE '%$_q%')";
00157                 }
00158                 // reset title buffer
00159                 $_title_buffer = '';
00160             } else {
00161                 switch ($_field) {
00162                     case 'location' :
00163                         $_subquery = 'SELECT location_id FROM mst_location WHERE location_name=\''.$_q.'\'';
00164                         if ($_b == '-') {
00165                             $_sql_criteria .= " item.location_id NOT IN ($_subquery)";
00166                         } else { $_sql_criteria .= " item.location_id IN ($_subquery)"; }
00167                         break;
00168                     case 'colltype' :
00169                         $_subquery = 'SELECT coll_type_id FROM mst_coll_type WHERE coll_type_name=\''.$_q.'\'';
00170                         if ($_b == '-') {
00171                             $_sql_criteria .= " item.coll_type_id NOT IN ($_subquery)";
00172                         } else { $_sql_criteria .= " item.coll_type_id IN ($_subquery)"; }
00173                         break;
00174                     case 'itemcode' :
00175                         if ($_b == '-') {
00176                             $_sql_criteria .= " item.item_code != '$_q'";
00177                         } else { $_sql_criteria .= " item.item_code LIKE '$_q%'"; }
00178                         break;
00179                     case 'callnumber' :
00180                         if ($_b == '-') {
00181                             $_sql_criteria .= ' AND biblio.call_number NOT LIKE \''.$_q.'%\'';
00182                         } else { $_sql_criteria .= ' biblio.call_number LIKE \''.$_q.'%\''; }
00183                         break;
00184                     case 'itemcallnumber' :
00185                         if ($_b == '-') {
00186                             $_sql_criteria .= ' AND item.call_number NOT LIKE \''.$_q.'%\'';
00187                         } else { $_sql_criteria .= ' item.call_number LIKE \''.$_q.'%\''; }
00188                         break;
00189                     case 'class' :
00190                         if ($_b == '-') {
00191                             $_sql_criteria .= ' AND biblio.classification NOT LIKE \''.$_q.'%\'';
00192                         } else { $_sql_criteria .= ' biblio.classification LIKE \''.$_q.'%\''; }
00193                         break;
00194                     case 'isbn' :
00195                         if ($_b == '-') {
00196                             $_sql_criteria .= ' AND biblio.isbn_issn!=\''.$_q.'\'';
00197                         } else { $_sql_criteria .= ' biblio.isbn_issn=\''.$_q.'\''; }
00198                         break;
00199                     case 'publisher' :
00200                         $_subquery = 'SELECT publisher_id FROM mst_publisher WHERE publisher_name=\''.$_q.'\'';
00201                         if ($_b == '-') {
00202                             $_sql_criteria .= " biblio.publisher_id NOT IN ($_subquery)";
00203                         } else { $_sql_criteria .= " biblio.publisher_id IN ($_subquery)"; }
00204                         break;
00205                     case 'publishyear' :
00206                         if ($_b == '-') {
00207                             $_sql_criteria .= ' AND biblio.publish_year!=\''.$_q.'\'';
00208                         } else { $_sql_criteria .= ' biblio.publish_year=\''.$_q.'\''; }
00209                         break;
00210                     case 'gmd' :
00211                         $_subquery = 'SELECT gmd_id FROM mst_gmd WHERE gmd_name=\''.$_q.'\'';
00212                         if ($_b == '-') {
00213                             $_sql_criteria .= " biblio.gmd_id NOT IN ($_subquery)";
00214                         } else { $_sql_criteria .= " biblio.gmd_id IN ($_subquery)"; }
00215                         break;
00216                     case 'notes' :
00217                         if ($_b == '-') {
00218                             $_sql_criteria .= " NOT (MATCH (biblio.notes) AGAINST ('".$_q."', IN BOOLEAN MODE))";
00219                         } else { $_sql_criteria .= " (MATCH (biblio.notes) AGAINST ('".$_q."', IN BOOLEAN MODE))"; }
00220                         break;
00221                 }
00222             }
00223         }
00224 
00225         // remove boolean's logic symbol prefix and suffix
00226         $_sql_criteria = preg_replace('@^(AND|OR|NOT)\s*|\s+(AND|OR|NOT)$@i', '', trim($_sql_criteria));
00227         // below for debugging purpose only
00228         // echo "<div style=\"border: 1px solid #ff0000; padding: 5px; color: #ff0000; margin: 5px;\">$_sql_criteria</div>";
00229 
00230         $this->criteria = array('sql_criteria' => $_sql_criteria, 'searched_fields' => $_searched_fields);
00231         return $this->criteria;
00232     }

00243     public function getDocumentList($int_num2show = 10, $bool_return_output = true)
00244     {
00245         global $sysconf;
00246         $this->num2show = $int_num2show;
00247         // get page number from http get var
00248         if (!isset($_GET['page']) OR $_GET['page'] < 1){
00249             $_page = 1;
00250         } else{
00251             $_page = (integer)$_GET['page'];
00252         }
00253         $this->current_page = $_page;
00254 
00255         // count the row offset
00256         if ($_page <= 1) {
00257             $_offset = 0;
00258         } else {
00259             $_offset = ($_page*$this->num2show) - $this->num2show;
00260         }
00261 
00262         // init sql string
00263         $_sql_str = 'SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS biblio.biblio_id, biblio.title, biblio.image, biblio.labels';
00264 
00265         // checking custom frontpage fields file
00266         $custom_frontpage_record_file = SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.$sysconf['template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['template']['theme'].'/custom_frontpage_record.inc.php';
00267         if (file_exists($custom_frontpage_record_file)) {
00268             include $custom_frontpage_record_file;
00269             $this->enable_custom_frontpage = true;
00270             $this->custom_fields = $custom_fields;
00271             foreach ($this->custom_fields as $_field => $_field_opts) {
00272                 if ($_field_opts[0] == 1 && $_field != 'availability') {
00273                     $_sql_str .= ", biblio.$_field";
00274                 }
00275             }
00276         }
00277 
00278         // additional SQL string
00279         $_add_sql_str = '';
00280 
00281         // location
00282         if ($this->criteria) {
00283             if (isset($this->criteria['searched_fields']['location']) OR isset($this->criteria['searched_fields']['colltype'])) {
00284                 $_add_sql_str .= ' LEFT JOIN item ON b.biblio_id=i.biblio_id ';
00285             }
00286         }
00287 
00288         $_add_sql_str .= ' WHERE opac_hide=0 ';
00289         // promoted flag
00290         if ($this->only_promoted) { $_add_sql_str .= ' AND promoted=1'; }
00291         // main search criteria
00292         if ($this->criteria) {
00293             $_add_sql_str .= ' AND ('.$this->criteria['sql_criteria'].') ';
00294         }
00295 
00296         $_sql_str .= ' FROM biblio '.$_add_sql_str.' ORDER BY biblio.last_update DESC LIMIT '.$_offset.', '.$this->num2show;
00297         // for debugging purpose only
00298         // echo "<div style=\"border: 1px solid navy; padding: 5px; color: navy; margin: 5px;\">$_sql_str</div>";
00299         // start time
00300         $_start = function_exists('microtime')?microtime(true):time();
00301         // execute query
00302         $this->resultset = $this->obj_db->query($_sql_str);
00303         if ($this->obj_db->error) {
00304             $this->query_error = $this->obj_db->error;
00305         }
00306         // get total number of rows from query
00307         $_total_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT FOUND_ROWS()');
00308         $_total_d = $_total_q->fetch_row();
00309         $this->num_rows = $_total_d[0];
00310         // end time
00311         $_end = function_exists('microtime')?microtime(true):time();
00312         $this->query_time = round($_end-$_start, 5);
00313         if ($bool_return_output) {
00314             // return the html result
00315             return $this->makeOutput();
00316         }
00317     }
00318 
00319 
00325     protected function makeOutput()
00326     {
00327         global $sysconf;
00328         // init the result buffer
00329         $_buffer = '';
00330 
00331         // loop data
00332         $_i = 0;
00333         if (!$this->resultset) {
00334             return '<div style="border: 1px dotted #FF0000; color: #FF0000; padding: 5px; margin: 5px;">Query error : '.$this->query_error.'</div>';
00335         }
00336         while ($_biblio_d = $this->resultset->fetch_assoc()) {
00337             $_biblio_d['title'] = '<a href="'.$sysconf['baseurl'].'index.php?p=show_detail&id='.$_biblio_d['biblio_id'].'" title="'.__('Record Detail').'">'.$_biblio_d['title'].'</a>';
00338             // label
00339             if ($this->show_labels AND !empty($_biblio_d['labels'])) {
00340                 $arr_labels = @unserialize($_biblio_d['labels']);
00341                 if ($arr_labels !== false) {
00342                  foreach ($arr_labels as $label) {
00343                      if (!isset($this->label_cache[$label[0]]['name'])) {
00344                          $_label_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT label_name, label_desc, label_image FROM mst_label AS lb
00345                              WHERE lb.label_name=\''.$label[0].'\'');
00346                          $_label_d = $_label_q->fetch_row();
00347                          $this->label_cache[$label[0]] = array('name' => $_label_d[0], 'desc' => $_label_d[1], 'image' => $_label_d[2]);
00348                      }
00349                      if (isset($label[1]) && $label[1]) {
00350                          $_biblio_d['title'] .= ' <a href="'.$label[1].'" target="_blank"><img src="'.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.IMAGES_DIR.'/labels/'.$this->label_cache[$label[0]]['image'].'" title="'.$this->label_cache[$label[0]]['desc'].'" align="middle" class="labels" border="0" /></a>';
00351                      } else {
00352                          $_biblio_d['title'] .= ' <img src="'.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.IMAGES_DIR.'/labels/'.$this->label_cache[$label[0]]['image'].'" title="'.$this->label_cache[$label[0]]['desc'].'" align="middle" class="labels" />';
00353                      }
00354                  }
00355         }
00356             }
00357             // button
00358             $_biblio_d['detail_button'] = '<a href="'.$sysconf['baseurl'].'index.php?p=show_detail&id='.$_biblio_d['biblio_id'].'" class="detailLink" title="'.__('Record Detail').'">'.__('Record Detail').'</a>';
00359             if ($this->xml_detail) {
00360                 $_biblio_d['xml_button'] = '<a href="'.$sysconf['baseurl'].'index.php?p=show_detail&inXML=true&id='.$_biblio_d['biblio_id'].'" class="xmlDetailLink" title="View Detail in XML Format" target="_blank">XML Detail</a>';
00361             } else {
00362                 $_biblio_d['xml_button'] = '';
00363             }
00364 
00365             // cover images var
00366             $_image_cover = '';
00367             if (!empty($_biblio_d['image']) && !defined('LIGHTWEIGHT_MODE')) {
00368                 $_biblio_d['image'] = urlencode($_biblio_d['image']);
00369                 $images_loc = 'images/docs/'.$_biblio_d['image'];
00370                 if (file_exists($images_loc)) {
00371                     $_image_cover = 'style="background-image: url(./lib/phpthumb/phpThumb.php?src=../../'.$images_loc.'&w=42); background-repeat: no-repeat;"';
00372                 }
00373             }
00374 
00375             $_alt_list = ($_i%2 == 0)?'alterList':'alterList2';
00376             $_buffer .= '<div class="item '.$_alt_list.'" '.$_image_cover.'>'.$_biblio_d['title'].'<br />';
00377             // query the author
00378             $_author_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT a.author_name FROM biblio_author AS ba
00379                 LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON ba.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00380                 LEFT JOIN mst_author AS a ON ba.author_id=a.author_id WHERE ba.biblio_id='.$_biblio_d['biblio_id']);
00381             // concat author data
00382             $_authors = '';
00383             while ($_author_d = $_author_q->fetch_row()) {
00384                 $_authors .= $_author_d[0].' - ';
00385             }
00386             if ($_authors) {
00387                 // replace the last strip
00388                 $_authors = substr_replace($_authors, '', -3);
00389                 $_buffer .= '<div class="subItem authorField"><b>'.__('Author(s)').'</b> : '.$_authors.'</div>';
00390             }
00391 
00392             # checking custom file
00393             if ($this->enable_custom_frontpage AND $this->custom_fields) {
00394                 foreach ($this->custom_fields as $_field => $_field_opts) {
00395                     if ($_field_opts[0] == 1) {
00396                         if ($_field == 'edition') {
00397                             $_buffer .= '<div class="customField editionField"><b>'.$_field_opts[1].'</b> : '.$_biblio_d['edition'].'</div>';
00398                         } else if ($_field == 'isbn_issn') {
00399                             $_buffer .= '<div class="customField isbnField"><b>'.$_field_opts[1].'</b> : '.$_biblio_d['isbn_issn'].'</div>';
00400                         } else if ($_field == 'collation') {
00401                             $_buffer .= '<div class="customField collationField"><b>'.$_field_opts[1].'</b> : '.$_biblio_d['collation'].'</div>';
00402                         } else if ($_field == 'series_title') {
00403                             $_buffer .= '<div class="customField seriesTitleField"><b>'.$_field_opts[1].'</b> : '.$_biblio_d['series_title'].'</div>';
00404                         } else if ($_field == 'call_number') {
00405                             $_buffer .= '<div class="customField callNumberField"><b>'.$_field_opts[1].'</b> : '.$_biblio_d['call_number'].'</div>';
00406                         } else if ($_field == 'availability') {
00407                             // get total number of this biblio items/copies
00408                             $_item_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item WHERE biblio_id='.$_biblio_d['biblio_id']);
00409                             $_item_c = $_item_q->fetch_row();
00410                             // get total number of currently borrowed copies
00411                             $_borrowed_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM loan AS l INNER JOIN item AS i'
00412                                 .' ON l.item_code=i.item_code WHERE l.is_lent=1 AND l.is_return=0 AND i.biblio_id='.$_biblio_d['biblio_id']);
00413                             $_borrowed_c = $_borrowed_q->fetch_row();
00414                             // total available
00415                             $_total_avail = $_item_c[0]-$_borrowed_c[0];
00416                             if ($_total_avail < 1) {
00417                                 $_buffer .= '<div class="customField availabilityField"><b>'.$_field_opts[1].'</b> : <strong style="color: #FF0000;">none copy available</strong></div>';
00418                             } else {
00419                                 $_buffer .= '<div class="customField availabilityField"><b>'.$_field_opts[1].'</b> : '.$_total_avail.' copies available for loan</div>';
00420                             }
00421                         }
00422                     }
00423                 }
00424             }
00425 
00426             $_buffer .= '<div class="subItem">'.$_biblio_d['detail_button'].' '.$_biblio_d['xml_button'].'</div>';
00427             $_buffer .= "</div>\n";
00428             $_i++;
00429         }
00430 
00431         // free resultset memory
00432         $this->resultset->free_result();
00433 
00434         // paging
00435         if (($this->num_rows > $this->num2show)) {
00436             $_paging = '<hr width="97%" size="1" />'."\n";
00437             $_paging .= '<div style="text-align: center;">'.simbio_paging::paging($this->num_rows, $this->num2show, 5).'</div>';
00438         } else {
00439             $_paging = '';
00440         }
00441 
00442         return $_buffer.$_paging;
00443     }

00452     public function XMLresult()
00453     {
00454         global $sysconf;
00455         // loop data
00456         $_buffer = '<modsCollection xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/mods/v3" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.loc.gov/mods/v3 http://www.loc.gov/standards/mods/v3/mods-3-3.xsd">'."\n";
00457         $_buffer .= '<modsResultNum>'.$this->num_rows.'</modsResultNum>'."\n";
00458         $_buffer .= '<modsResultPage>'.$this->current_page.'</modsResultPage>'."\n";
00459         $_buffer .= '<modsResultShowed>'.$this->num2show.'</modsResultShowed>'."\n";
00460         while ($_biblio_d = $this->resultset->fetch_assoc()) {
00461             $_buffer .= '<mods ID="'.$_biblio_d['biblio_id'].'">'."\n";
00462             // parse title
00463             $_title_sub = '';
00464             if (stripos($_biblio_d['title'], ':') !== false) {
00465                 $_title_main = trim(substr_replace($_biblio_d['title'], '', stripos($_biblio_d['title'], ':')+1));
00466                 $_title_sub = trim(substr_replace($_biblio_d['title'], '', 0, stripos($_biblio_d['title'], ':')+1));
00467             } else {
00468                 $_title_main = trim($_biblio_d['title']);
00469             }
00470 
00471             $_buffer .= '<titleInfo>'."\n".'<title>'.$_title_main.'</title>'."\n";
00472             if ($_title_sub) {
00473                 $_buffer .= '<subTitle>'.$_title_sub.'</subTitle>'."\n";
00474             }
00475             $_buffer .= '</titleInfo>'."\n";
00476 
00477             // get the authors data
00478             $_biblio_authors_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT a.*,ba.level FROM mst_author AS a'
00479                 .' LEFT JOIN biblio_author AS ba ON a.author_id=ba.author_id WHERE ba.biblio_id='.$_biblio_d['biblio_id']);
00480             while ($_auth_d = $_biblio_authors_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00481                 $_buffer .= '<name type="'.$sysconf['authority_type'][$_auth_d['authority_type']].'" authority="'.$_auth_d['auth_list'].'">'."\n"
00482                   .'<namePart>'.$_auth_d['author_name'].'</namePart>'."\n"
00483                   .'<role><roleTerm type="text">'.$sysconf['authority_level'][$_auth_d['level']].'</roleTerm></role>'."\n"
00484                 .'</name>'."\n";
00485             }
00486             $_buffer .= '<typeOfResource manuscript="yes" collection="yes">mixed material</typeOfResource>'."\n";
00487             $_biblio_authors_q->free_result();
00488             $_buffer .= '</mods>'."\n";
00489         }
00490         $_buffer .= '</modsCollection>';
00491 
00492         // free resultset memory
00493         $this->resultset->free_result();
00494 
00495         return $_buffer;
00496     }
00497 
00498 
00504     public function getDocumentIds()
00505     {
00506         $_temp_resultset = $this->resultset;
00507         while ($_biblio_d = $_temp_resultset->fetch_assoc()) {
00508             $this->biblio_ids[] = $_biblio_d['biblio_id'];
00509         }
00510         unset($_temp_resultset);
00511         return $this->biblio_ids;
00512     }
00513 }
